targets.query: SELECT cumulative_sum(difference(last("rain_mm")))*0.03937 FROM "${rainSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT cumulative_sum(difference(last("strike_count"))) FROM "${lightningSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("temperature_C")  *1.8+32 FROM "${tempSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("humidity") FROM "${tempSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT (last("temperature_C") - ((100-last("humidity")) /5) ) *1.8+32 FROM "${tempSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT cumulative_sum(difference(last("rain_mm")))*0.03937 FROM "${rainSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("wind_avg_km_h") * 0.6213712 FROM "${windSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("strike_count")) FROM "${lightningSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last("storm_dist") * 0.6213712 FROM "${lightningSensor}" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT last("temperature_C")  *1.8+32 FROM "Acurite-606TX" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("temperature_C")  *1.8+32 FROM "Hideki-TS04" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("temperature_C") *1.8+32 FROM "Acurite-Tower" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("temperature_C") *1.8+32 FROM "Acurite-6045M" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("temperature_C") *1.8+32 FROM "Acurite-5n1" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

alert.message: LaCrosse Battery Low.  Change the one in the rain gauge too.
alert.name: LaCrosse Battery Check alert

alert.message: AcuRiute Lightning sensor reports a problem.
alert.name: Acurite 6045M Exception Check alert

alert.message: Batteries in 5-in-1 station need to be changed.
alert.name: Acurite 5-in-1 Weatherstation alert

panels.description: This panel is only really for monitoring and has no useful info.
panels.title: EcoWitt Data Monitor
